components.component:
org.richfaces.ProgressBar org.richfaces.ProgressBar org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlProgressBar org.richfaces.component.UIProgressBar
org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlProgressBarComponentTest org.ajax4jsf.tests.AbstractAjax4JsfTestCase
The <rich:progressBar> component is designed for displaying a progress bar which shows the current status of the process.
initial Defines the information content about the state of the process if the progress value is less or equal to "minValue"
complete Defines the information content about the state of the process if the value is greater or equal to "maxValue"
org.richfaces.renderkit.ProgressBarRenderer org/richfaces/progressBar.jspx
progressBar org.richfaces.taglib.ProgressBarTag
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.AjaxComponentHandler
&ui_component_attributes; &ui_command_attributes; &html_style_attributes; &ajax_component_attributes; &html_events;
title java.lang.String Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component
mode java.lang.String Attributes defines AJAX or CLIENT modes for component. Possible values are "ajax", "client". Default value is "ajax". "ajax"
parameters java.lang.Object Parameters for macrosubstitution in the label
label java.lang.String Attribute defines a simple label instead of rendering children component
dualColoredLabel java.lang.Boolean Defines if component renderes as simple markup. Default value is "false". false
minValue java.lang.Object Min value when initial state should be rendered. Default value is "0". 0
maxValue java.lang.Object Max value, after which complete state should be rendered. Default value is "100". 100
progressVar java.lang.String DEPRECATED. Provides access to value of the component on the client
styleClass java.lang.String CSS class that defines style for progress bar
completeClass java.lang.String CSS class that defines style for progress line rendering
remainClass java.lang.String CSS class that defines style for remained part of progress bar
initialClass java.lang.String CSS class that defines style for initial state of the component
finishClass java.lang.String CSS class that defines style for complete state of the component
reRenderAfterComplete java.lang.String Set of componets to rerender after completion
actionExpression
action javax.faces.el.MethodBinding The action method binding expression.
onsubmit java.lang.String
JavaScript code for call before submission of ajax event
interval int
Interval (in ms) for call poll requests. Default value 1000 ms (1 sec)
1000
enabled boolean
Enables/disables polling. Default value is "true".
true
value java.lang.Object
Sets the current value of the progress
submitted boolean
requestDelay int
ignoreDupResponses boolean
Attribute allows to ignore an Ajax Response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in a queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows to avoid unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now
onkeydown java.lang.String
onkeypress java.lang.String
onkeyup java.lang.String
